title: Chapter 1
passage: But nothing I have seen in the world has supported your pronouncements that love is more powerful than my kind of magic, Dumbledore.

title: Chapter 2
passage: Greatness inspires envy, envy engenders spite, spite spawns lies.

title: Chapter 3
passage: There is no good and evil. There is only power. And those too weak to seek it.

title: Chapter 4
passage: I'm going to kill you, Harry Potter. I'm going to destroy you.
